definition[0]: an organization, meeting, TV programme etc where people have a chance to publicly discuss an important subject
example[0]: The journal aims to provide a forum for discussion and debate.
example[1]: the new national forum on the environment
definition[1]: a group of computer users who are interested in a particular subject and discuss it using email or the Internet
definition[2]: a large outdoor public place in ancient Rome used for business and discussion
example[2]: The journal provides a forum for discussion and debate.
